https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fRZ7dqvQCOiHvMruI7dYPomd7X4.jpg A satire about the dictatorship period in Brazil, in which communist militants try to steal the soccer World Cup Trophy from the players Pelé and Carlos Alberto Torres. Casseta & Planeta: A Taça do Mundo é Nossa!
